Name: She's Like
Ingredients: 20 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An unlikely combination of big rich flavours, but when served ice-cold this is either a very interesting Mediterranean aperitivo or a palate-cleansing digestivo.
History: Created in 2016 by Ilias Marinakis at 42 Bar, Athens, Greece.
Nutrition: One serving of She's Like contains 108 calories
